description:
Zero-drop shoes designed to promote a natural, fluid running style. The Escalante 3 is a lightweight, yet supportive, speed-focused shoe for training and race days. The wide toe box allows your foot to spread and splay naturally, the way nature intended.

  • Breathable knit upper offers a sock-like fit
  • Zero-drop encourages a natural running gait
  • Altra EGO™ EVA midsole is soft and responsive for great energy return
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
  • FootPod outsole is mapped to the bones and tendons of the human foot to promote natural movement
name: Altra Escalante 3 Road Running Shoes - Men's
